Add real-time seminar survey system with Supabase

- Participant survey page with multiple question types \(single/multiple choice, text, rating\)
- Admin dashboard with real-time results and chart visualization
- Question management functionality
- Supabase integration for data storage and real-time updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
